name: _id
description: The address of the account, in bech32 encoding. Same as `address`.

name: address
description: The address in bech32 encoding. Should be equal to the _id field.

name: balance
description: The amount of EGLD the address possesses. It is a string that also includes the number of decimals. Example: "1500000000000000000" (equivalent to 1.5 EGLD).

name: balanceNum
description: The amount of EGLD the address possesses, in a numeric format. Example: 1.5.

name: nonce
description: The sequence number of the address.

name: timestamp
description: The last moment when the address balance was changed.

name: developerRewards
description: The developerRewards represents the fees that were accumulated after all the smart contract calls. They can be claimed by the owner.

name: currentOwner
description: The address in a bech32 format of the current owner of the smart contract. This field is populated only for the smart contract addresses.
